headline: Brown & Brown Talent And Legal Strains Versus Valuation And Price Weakness
summary: Brown & Brown, Inc. (NYSE:BRO) has lost around 275 employees to a rival firm, triggering a talent and competitive challenge for the insurer. The company has pursued a legal injunction in response to the departures, signaling a firm stance on contractual and competitive protections. Brown & Brown is also mourning the passing of its Chief Legal Officer, a key figure in shaping its legal and governance framework. These developments come as NYSE:BRO trades at about $71.3, with the share price...
